title: Test query endpoint with mistral.rs running
close_reason: Tested query and search endpoints with mistral.rs (Qwen2.5-3B-Instruct). Both endpoints working correctly with RAG pipeline.

title: Weekly auto-update check for indexed sources
Add incremental update support - avoid duplicates when re-indexing
API/CLI to add new sources (GitHub repos, local files/folders)
close_reason: Added HTTP API endpoints for adding sources: POST /sources/github and POST /sources/local. CLI already existed.

title: Index additional repos: dioxus, sqlx, iced
close_reason: Indexed dioxuslabs/dioxus (1749 chunks), launchbadge/sqlx (850 chunks), iced-rs/iced (782 chunks). Total docs: 60,345

title: Scheduled update system: weekly check + download window (22:00-8:00 Moscow)
description: Combines brain-2z5 and brain-1r9: auto-check for source updates weekly, but only download during specified time window
close_reason: Implemented scheduler with weekly check and Moscow time window (22:00-8:00). Added commands: update check, update run, update status.
